'''Night Jade''' is a [[Quest Item]] that is automatically crafted after gathering {{Item|Shattered Night Jade|x=3}}. It is used to access the [[Chamber of Night's Trial]].

Obtaining the Night Jade will also grant the {{Achievement|Offering to Nothingness}}.
